channel.title: ∞Edge of Eternity∞ [Sponsored][Mature Community][Dedicated 24/7 40-Slot SMP/Crea
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i188.photobucket.com/albums/z176/competentfake/bannerblu.png[/img]
-=Edge of Eternity is a 40-slot dedicated Minecraft SMP Bukkit Server=- -=IP: 176.31.226.225:25643=- Server is located in EU, with minimal lag worldwide.
What you will find at EoE: Mature, Respectful Community ∞ 100% Legit Gameplay ∞ Ironclad Anti-Grief System Theft Prevention with Lockette ∞ Near-Vanilla Survival ∞ Gamemode 0 Leadership Ingame Shops with Chestshop ∞ Superflat Creative Map via Multiverse ∞ Age Limit 17 Enhanced Gameplay with mcMMO ∞ Whitelist Protection ∞ 30-slot Mumble Server
What you will not find: PVP/Factions ∞ Stealing ∞ Griefing ∞ Pixel Art ∞ Juveniles Whining ∞ Plugins Galore ∞ Handouts/Hand-Holding
Statement of Purpose: Our goal is to provide a fun, relaxed gaming environment in which the player can enjoy the challenge of the game without having to worry about the malicious intentions of others. ∞ We have accomplished this, not through rigorous screening of applicants or with draconian moderators, but simply as a by-product of the atmosphere of mutual respect and cooperation that exists in our small community. We employ only the bare minimum of game-enhancing plugins, preferring to embrace the Survival aspect of the game to the fullest. ∞ Most who apply are accepted, and our few simple rules are seldom broken. Despite the danger, the Edge is kept relaxed and groovy. Why not come and see for yourself?
Visit www.eoemc.com and click ‘Whitelist Me!’ to apply†, and be warned...
...don't look down.
†Please allow 48 hours to pass before asking for an update on your whitelist status. Thank you. [/center]

item.title: ∞Edge of Eternity∞ [Sponsored][Mature Community][Dedicated 24/7 40-Slot SMP/Crea
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Sorry, I don’t think that’s good enough. The migration to IPv6 is not just about maintaining backwards compatibility with IPv4, it’s about the encapsulation and endurance of next-generation development. It’s about syndicating the residential infrastructure to provide families with the stability and precedence they need. It’s about the children who may grow up never learning about NAT and the degenerance it provided.

Read full topic

@uzumi wrote:

The server doesnt use iPv6 is that is what you are asking, but even if you are using iPv6 you can still connect to iPv4
